comment.author: 78785369@N06
comment._content:
Second Lieutenant Bret Hercules Barnett was the son of son of Frederick S. and Dora Barnett.  He is commemorated amongst the missing on the Menin Gate at Ypres on Panel 6 and 8.

11th (Service) Battalion Royal Fusiliers landed at Boulogne in July 1915 as part of 54th Brigade, 18th (Eastern) Division.  11th Battalion Royal Fusiliers suffered heavy casualties on 10th August 1917 in the capture of Westhoek and Westhoek Ridge one of the actions that constituted the 3rd Battle of Ypres.
